introduceYourself.title: Engage and build trust through empathy
introduceYourself.description: Hello, my name is Jeff. I am a Laguna Coach living in the Catskills mountains. My role is to collaborate with you in your recovery journey. I can support you in a personalized way that works best for you. This may include education about health issues, helping you to navigate a complex health system, and overcoming any barriers to you getting care.

caregivers.title: Ask about member's care circle
caregivers.description:
- Tell me about the people in your life.
 - How is your family dealing with your hospitalization? Ask about family and pets. Obtain care circle contact information and ask the member for consent if you could reach out to them.

downloadApp.title: Guide the member in downloading the mobile app
downloadApp.description:
The Laguna app guides you through your at-home recovery journey. It's available on Apple and Android, you can use the app to communicate with me by chat, video or call. It offers educational content, daily logs, and other tools to help you recover faster and avoid preventable readmissions.
Send the member a text message with guidelines to install the member app.

homePreparation.title: Send home preparation explore articles
homePreparation.description:
Do you have what you need at home for your recovery? Explore articles for the member to review: - After Discharge Pt. 1: Preparing your home.
 - After Discharge Pt. 2: Medication and Nutrition.
 - After Discharge Pt. 3: Support Team (Care Circle + Other Caregivers).

poc.title: Create personalized POCs
poc.description: Intervene and influence. If barriers are identified, create barriers and plans of care (POCs) collaboratively with the member.

clinicalStatus.title: Assess inpatient clinical status
clinicalStatus.description:
- How are you doing today?
 - What brought you to in the hospital?
 - How is your treatment going?
 - Do you know when you will leave the hospital?

pillarsOfRecovery.title: Assess the 6 pillars of recovery in the app
pillarsOfRecovery.description: Evaluate the member on the six pillars (Pain, Mobility, Sleep, Appetite, Energy, Mood).

PersonaQuestionnaire.title: Persona questionnaire
PersonaQuestionnaire.description: Assess the member's skills and motivation levels.

assess1.title: Assess: Is the member more tired/weak than before?
assess1.description: Has it been improving or getting worse? "Recovery can be exhausting. Your body is working hard. It can be stressful when you are too tired or weak to take care of yourself. We will figure this out together"

assess2.title: Assess: Has the member discussed the fatigue/weakness with their healthcare team?
assess2.description: Help prepare the member to discuss with their providers.

assess3.title: Assess: Is the member comfortable communicating symptoms to their healthcare team?
assess3.description: If not comfortable, help prep member to discuss with their providers

prepareMemberToCallProvider1.title: Prep healthcare team visit: symptoms
prepareMemberToCallProvider1.description: "Physicians prefer that you report when your fatigue or weakness is not improving or worsening so they can evaluate if there is a cause that can be treated." Help your member make a list of symptoms to report to the healthcare team.

prepareMemberToCallProvider2.title: Prep healthcare team visit: clinical context
prepareMemberToCallProvider2.description:
Include contextual information: - When weakness started
 - Recent procedures and illnesses
 - New medications
 - Sleep patterns
 - Excessive movement or exercise
 - Changes or stressors in the memberâ€™s life

prepareMemberToCallProvider3.title: Prep healthcare team visit: call together (optional)
prepareMemberToCallProvider3.description: If the member is reluctant to communicate their symptoms effectively to the healthcare team, conference call with the member and the healthcare team.

phq9Questionnaire.title: PHQ-9 Questionnaire
phq9Questionnaire.description: Conduct the PHQ-9 on the phone or send it to the member in the app to be filled out after the appointment

memberTodo1.title: Member To-Do: How to prepare for a doctor's appointment
memberTodo1.description: Send the member the "How to prepare for a doctor's appointment" in the Laguna app

memberTodo2.title: Member To-Do: Communicate symptoms to the healthcare team
memberTodo2.description: Add Member To-Do to stress urgency in contacting the healthcare team

highPainScore.title: High pain level reported
highPainScore.description: Red flag for the following barrier: Poor pain management
